You're a pretty funny person -- maybe even a bit weird! But in a good way!
You have a good sense of humor, and you'll often be the one to brighten up a friend's day because of it.
You're always willing to try and make the best out of a bad situation, and can usually laugh it off.
Some things aren't meant to be taken too seriously, and you always know what they are.
However, you might occasionally end up bringing goofiness into situations that could do without it.
A goofy person like you will be...
